title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 666 - Regulation Or Administration And Management Of The Wild, Scenic And Recreational Rivers System In New York State Excepting Private Land In The Adirondack Park
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 666

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, art. 15, title 27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
